channel.title: Hope on oyogo
channel.description: Recent content in Hope on oyogo

item.title: Uhuru's experts
item.description: We all have a kingdom to rule and its prosperity is simply dependent on who sits on the right hand….. “I have set the LORD always before me; Because He is at my right hand I shall not be moved.” Psalms 16:8 The tenor of the president’s speech brought to prominence the mysterious power that sits behind the throne, he called them the ‘experts’. We are keenly watching the transpiration of things given the advice of these experts and whatever the outcome, it goes without saying that the experts will be held accountable.
